name: Wedding Day
description: As I reached adulthood, a village bully murdered me and abandoned my body in a temple. My fearful parents didn't seek revenge but, worried about my wandering spirit, arranged a ghostly marriage. This allowed me to rest peacefully in a suitor's ancestral tomb.

name: Earth: 3000
description: A post-apocalyptic survival RPG set on a desolate future earth, with unrestricted PVP, player-controlled towns and factions.

name: Ball Control
description: You are a ball, and you have to use your finger skills to reach the green zone, where you win and move on to the next level. The ball has gravity and you have to be careful that you might not be careful and break it.

name: Aquario
description: Let's face it, we all were once kids. There was a time when we wanted pets, and there was a moment when we wanted to keep a pet fish. Some of us got what they wanted; some didn't. Some cried, some forgot. Aquario is the game where you can live through this traumatic experience again, or anew.

name: Devil Road Run!
description: Run away from the oncoming heroes! Create a path by placing blocks in the direction the Devil is going, and lead her to the goal by blocking the way of the heroes with monsters and blocks, so that the heroes will not catch up with her!

name: Ball
description: Earn a crate from a unique collection for every 3 hours you play. When you open a crate, you'll receive one random ball out of 15 possible options. The balls are divided into 5 different rarity levels. Do you have what it takes to collect them all?

name: Scavenged By Sunset
description: Scavenged by Sunset is a multiplayer (4vs1) survival horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Hunter, and the other four players play as Prey, trying to avoid the Hunter. Collecting coins and traveling through portals allow Prey the ability to escape to victory!

name: The Concentration of Lust
description: Become the Master of All Spells, who unexpectedly discovers uninvited female guests in his tower. Battle mysterious women in a strategic casual Point & Click minigame and uncover dark secrets. Immerse yourself in magical fantasy and master both magic and passion.

name: Zombie Go Remastered
description: Zombie GO is a puzzle turn-based game with more than 50 beautiful levels. You play as a man who survived the virus and must run away from zombies. On some levels, you must survive people.

name: Gold Mine Dash
description: Dive into the depths of the gold mine, navigate through tricky puzzles, and become the ultimate treasure hunter in Gold Mine Dash!

name: Achieve-Its
description: Welcome to Achieve-Its, the adorable and fast-paced platformer that challenges you to collect as many achievements as possible in record time! Dive into a vibrant, colorful world filled with cute characters, tricky obstacles, and a plethora of achievements waiting to be unlocked.

name: Tokyo Train 4
description: "Tokyo Train 4" is now available! Beat the evening rush hour!

name: Final Night
description: A nightmarish descent into your worst memories awaits. In "Final Night," you're forced to relive your darkest traumas - now twisted into monstrous, living horrors that hunt you relentlessly. Every shadow hides a piece of your broken past, eager to drag you into the abyss.

name: Shroud
description: In an otherworldly twilight born from the petals of a mysterious cosmic flower, a shrouded girl seeks to sever the threads holding it together. In this 2D action platformer, use your ferocity and grace to traverse a variety of unique levels full of methodical encounters and untold new powers.

name: Destruction Simulator
description: Destruction simulator is a demolition simulation game, where you take on the role of a construction worker. You are tasked with the destruction of multiple buildings, using your tools to fullfill your job.

name: Duelant
description: Blood, money and courage merge in different eras. It's time to determine the strongest fighter in this virtual world. Exciting battles await you in a variety of environments where your skill and chutzpah will play a decisive role.

name: Pigeon
description: Pigeon is an action adventure in the original universe. Immerse yourself in a deep and interesting story. Playing as Richard, set out to save the village from the hordes of creatures that have been trapped for centuries in the bowels of the earth.

name: The Most Searched Playground: Paris 2024
description: Uncover 20 of the most searched sports, French icons, and moments from the Games’ history.

name: Pokémon Online
description: Pokémon Online was an online Pokémon fangame. The game was an online Pokémon battle simulator which let players to simulator battles across the internet and play online with other players.

name: Frozen Heart
description:
To bring death and destruction upon this dying world. Drench the land with bodies and flood the rivers with blood. Fill the void of your frozen heart with vibrant colors and infinite beauty caged inside.

It's a megawad composed of short maps, where every map has death exit. Will you find it in your heart?

name: TNTPhobia
description: An oniric walking-simulator ﻿tribute to TNT: Evilution ﻿﻿

name: Paradise Up Above: Gold Label Edition
description: Paradise Up Above: Gold Label Edition comes with 18 total maps tak﻿ing place in beautiful tropical locales, majestic skybound islands, Heavenly hot-spots, and the sinister shadow of Hell that eternally follows Doomguy wherever he goes, even in his journey for a peaceful place to rest his weary hands.

name: Russian Random Speedmap Pack 3
description: Russian Random Speedmapping Sessions is a speedmapping festival, where the goal was not a timer, but high-quality maps realized in a short time, the development of which would not go into endless construction. The result was 25 mappers have come together to create 64 maps with unique gameplay, ideas and experiments.

name: Brotherhood of Ruin 2024: Element Temple Research Complex
description: This is a very large UDMF map which has many different routes to take and uses the Supercharge mod.

name: Marbellous
description: A medium-sized level with lots of marble.

name: Certain Death
description: Two small maps set on a Hell-infested planet called Tromos.

name: Nuke Mine
description: A rather parodic story explains that the player has been sent on a surveillance mission to find out what happened on the nuke mine of Nexus 14, which has been infested by demons coming through a time-continuum breach, but has decided to clean up the invasion alone instead.

name: Bleak House
description: It is based around a large mansion, with emphasis in exploration and close-quarters combat.

name: Hollow Minds
description: Hollow Minds is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using the ZDoom source port. It was designed by Kristian Aro and is named after his own music track "Hollow Minds".

name: Zillions of Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Mad Head
description: Sin descripción

name: City Turn
description: City Turn is a 2D single player, turn based game. The player is competing against a program (AI) in finding the same 5 images in the given order. Player can win/loose points and be hit by the objects. Buildings are stored differently for each game on loading game.

name: Cubidle
description: An idle clicker game with prestige, perks, interest, evolving system, difficulty tiers, ranking and many other features!

name: Descent X
description: Descent X is a top-down bullet shooter that focuses on maneuvering and prop stacking. In this cyberworld full of enemies, use your imagination and creativity to match a variety of combat styles and define a game experience that is uniquely yours!

name: Lober Lobe
description: Shoot psychic orbs, collect power-ups, upgrade your flying brain in this wave based procedurally generated space-shoot 'em up.

name: Tiny Terraces
description: A cozy idle farming game, watch tiny guys do tasks around the terrace, expand, progress, and decorate your Tiny Terrace.

name: Catbo
description: This is a cute, casual, and fast-paced arcade pinball game .Using Combo to increase feelings with cats.

name: Drop Cooking
description: Drop Foods into the Pot and Cook the Dishes! In this exciting game, drop foods into the pot and create delicious dishes! When the necessary foods for a recipe come into contact, they attach together, and when all the required foods are combined, the dish is complete.

name: Muggo Clicker
description: Introducing Muggo Clicker, the addictive idle clicker game! Muggo, the adorable alien who loves clicks. Each click raises your counter and offers a chance for epic drops. Equip, flaunt, or trade your treasures. Click, collect, and conquer – who knew clicking a Muggo could be this fun? Start now!

name: My Dear Love
description: Heartful and wholesome stat-raiser otome game with a cooking mini game! Help take care of Katsuya, the adorable little nephew of your crush!

name: Oh the Humanity!
description: An alien civilization found the remaining ruins of the humans, millions of years after they went extinct. Aliens think humans were vicious, fool and disgusting creatures based on its own research. Almost no technology was found, except some petrified war machines and vehicles.

name: Midnight Spooks: The Thing in the Basement
description: Sin descripción

name: Duriano
description: Duriano is a top-down arena shooting Slasher roguelike game where the player will be a hero durian of the norse wielding a weapon to fight upon a god of norse mythology. From different weapons, Durian hero, God’s trail, items will lead the player to create a build and defeat all gods of asgard.

name: Dungeon Done
description: Dungeon Done is a PvE co-op horror survival extraction game where players explore dungeons previously cleared by heroes. The objective is for up to six players to team up, gathering hidden treasures and evading lurking dangers to make their daring escape.

name: Improbability
description: You are all assigned with investigating the backrooms and containing the anomaly. Be aware. There is a high chance of casualties, psychological damage, trauma, and frightening encounters. The safety of the United States relies on you, but what secrets could these members be hiding?

name: Hidden Cats In Fallen Leaves Town
description: Find cute cats in Fallen Leaves Town. Can you find them all? Meow Meow...Kittens are calling you！

name: Croak Cafe: From Pond to Plate
description: Croak Cafe: From Pond to Plate is a thrilling roguelike game where you craft dishes under time pressure to serve demanding frogs. Upgrade your skills and face challenging bosses in this fast-paced culinary adventure. Can you become the ultimate chef?

name: Hexaquest
description: Play as a magical die in this ‘dice-builder’ RPG where each of your faces casts a different spell. Discover and combine new spells as you explore a world of eccentric animate board game tokens, all fighting for the affections of the Gods of the Tabletop...

name: Capital
description: A non-linear action-adventure heist game with destructible buildings, use stolen loot to buy bigger explosives and access higher value loot. Buy and customize cars. Invest in military equipment such as helicopters and tanks. Get your mansion!

name: Nonentity Galaxy
description: Nonentity Galaxy is a rouge-lite strategy game about starship battle, asset management, dark humor, and jobbery. You need to play the role of a fleet commander in the field to make money for the company , just try to survive in these miserable times. Fortunately, you have friends, life goes on.

name: Barbarization
description: Barbarization is a roguelite dungeon crawler with elements of bullet hell, deck building and strategy. Civilization fell to the dark legions now swarming this land. From the ruins of what is left, unlikely heroes emerge to reclaim it from the scourge.

name: Cyborg: Rise
description: An adventure game that combines first person shooter and Roguelite random elements. Players can manipulate heroes with different abilities in the game. Embark on adventure challenges in random levels. Every time you respawn, you can unlock new skills and equipment to challenge stronger enemies.

name: Neo Ha_Bits
description: Neo Ha_Bits plunges players into a chilling journey of psychological horror and mystery within a cyberpunk setting.

name: Kimi sae Ireba: Episode Sutelz
description: The Heflitian Girl's past is about to be revealed! This is a Drama and Action Adventure with a deep story and mysteries originating from an ancient planet... Planet Earth, which was destroyed and forgotten...

name: RotorScape
description: RotorScape is a shoot 'em up style game with a 2.5D perspective, where you fly a helicopter. You can collect different weapons to use in combat. The game has stages with different themes and climates, as well as threatening bosses. RotorScape proposes a 90s style of gameplay.

name: Unbodied
description: Unbodied, a small adventure in which you play a skeleton whose body has been stolen. Control your magic wand, solve all the puzzles and find all the spells to finish with the powerful wizard and thus, recover what is yours.

name: Bean There Won That
description: A physics driven party game designed to tests your friendships! Engage in a variety of crazy minigames as you shoot, boot and bash your way up to the top of the scoreboard! Online or splitscreen, you can crush your friends worldwide.

name: Ninja Clan
description: Ninja Clan is a Strategy narrative-driven game. Guide your ninja clan from inception to its rise or downfall. Train ninjas, complete missions, and make crucial decisions that will shape the fate of your clan and its legacy...

name: Avocado
description: Avocado is a clicker game made with the next generation in green technology, in which you click an avocado! In Avocado you click the avocado to obtain even more avocados! Drop new and exciting avocados to trade with your friends! Come and enjoy yourself as a part of the Avocado gang!

name: Malum Escape
description: Experience a free co-op Escape Room set in the Malum universe. Trapped in an atmospheric horror house, you and your team must solve puzzles to escape. Will you make it out alive?

name: Fallen Echo
description: Explore cool pixel style levels fighting your way through alien hordes that have taken over planet earth, and you will navigate through traps set to frustrate your mission helping the human resistance. You are humanity's last hope.

name: Ether
description: Help a Space Mercenary, Ether, complete a difficult scavenging mission in an abandoned ship. Explore 4 different biomes, each with its share of dangers, and escape a swarm of mutant space bugs.

name: A Gentlemen's Dispute
description: Be the last gentleman standing in this old-fashioned slapstick party brawler! Wield preposterous and laughable items and collect insane perks to cause maximum chaos. Destroy your private islands, gardens, and ballrooms. Anything it takes to prove yourself the most gentlemanly of them all!

name: ClaustrophobicCrypt
description: Map the labyrinth in your mind, your sanity and escape a derelict spaceship's terrifying maze in Claustrophobic Crypt, a single-player psychological horror adventure. Experience dread in stunning resolutions up to 4K and silky smooth 120 FPS gameplay.

name: Distant
description: A mysterious object brings a former detective to a distant place in the middle of nowhere, where the worst nightmares clash with reality. Are you prepared to face your fears in what might be your last investigation?

name: 101 Cats Hidden in India
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the India landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Dictionary Blaster
description: Learn English words without the pain through a selection of arcade style action games. Over 1000 verbs and nouns are featured in multiple categories with corresponding pictures and audio.

name: None Shall Intrude
description: Venture into None Shall Intrude, a roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign. Will you conquer all or fall to valiant heroes?

name: BrickLike
description: A refreshing twist on an old classic, mixing arcade gameplay with the roguelike genre. Test your skill, break bricks, make combos, turns balls aflame and electrify bosses in this frenetic experience!

name: Sudoku Topology
description: Explore classic sudoku variant rules on 3D boards ranging from cubes and spheres to dodecahedron and the Klein bottle. Experience beautiful logic of handcrafted puzzles where no guessing is required. Or design your own 3D sudoku puzzles and share them with the world!

name: Empire: Sound of the North
description: Empire: Sound of the North, a swipe em up cards game. Swipe the cards, go on adventures, solve puzzles and mysteries, make everyone happy and create your own kingdom.

name: Invasion of the Mushroom Men of Planet Y!
description: This is a quick, goofy game that lasts about ten minutes per play through-unless you choose wrongly-organ music, please! In addition to your choices, there is also the random element of chance that may affect your fate. Due to the constraints of the game engine, can only be viewed in windows mode.

name: Mother Bunker VR
description:
Embark on a Post-Apocalyptic Virtual Reality Adventure Like No Other!
Welcome to Mother Bunker, an open-world, post-apocalyptic zombie first-person shooter (FPS) that combines intense survival with a touch of humor. This single-player VR game, crafted for ages 16+, will challenge your decision-making, resource management, and combat skills in a beautifully designed low-poly world.

name: Project X: Light Years
description: A modern reimagining of the classic Amiga side-scrolling shooter. Engage in high-octane space combat as you navigate through visually stunning environments, obliterate swarms of enemies, and upgrade your arsenal to become the ultimate space fighter pilot.

name: Zombie Blitzkrieg
description: Survive against zombies in this turn-based tactical roguelike. Outsmart your enemies in fast-paced battles using different weapons. Pick rewards and power up your character to conquer increasingly challenging levels.

name: Ragdoll Universe
description: Enjoy a ragdoll physics game full of challenges and fun. Overcome levels inspired by famous situations, collect points, unlock characters and upgrades. Shoot, fight, jump, and laugh out loud in this exciting world of random characters. Join the action!

name: Enigma Awaken
description: You are a mercenary hired by a billionaire to retrieve an ancient artifact from a lost civilization. Explore diverse landscapes, solve complex puzzles, and engage in thrilling action. This solo-developed, AI-assisted game offers a rich story with surprising events and stunning visuals.

name: Tchin
description: Play a 3D Monster Taming Open World game ! Tame Tchins and use them for battle. Every Tchin is unique, they can have different colors,bones and brain. Raise your own custom army of tchins and conquer the world!

name: Slidezzle
description: A sliding puzzle game! Your goal is to move all the colored blocks to their designated tiles, by moving everything in the same direction at the same time. Think ahead and plan your moves carefully to solve each level.

name: Super Shaking Girl!!!
description: Shake things up with SUPER SHAKING GIRL!!!, an exhilarating action game that'll have you shaking sodas to propel yourself through the air! Shake, fly, rinse, and repeat... The sky's the limit!

name: Backrooms: Facility Unknown
description: Backrooms: Facility Unknown - Is a co-op horror game about exploration of dangerous facility. Wander around the complex alone or with friends. In any case, your task is to do your job and survive

name: Cascadia
description: Compete to create the most perfect ecosystem in the award-winning board game journey!

name: Error86
description: Bullet hell about destroying computers. Be the ultimate bug you ever wanted to be. Swarm those capacitors and break the boards! [THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT]

name: Kitchen Trials: Rush
description: Return to the kitchen as fast as possible using your chef's knife on a chain to whip through living vegetables to pass your first trial in this kitchen-themed 2D platformer. Obtain all the stars with the fastest times to surpass the other competitors! How fast will you rush back to the kitchen?

name: Drive Out
description: Drive out is a horror game for up to four players in online co-op. As a member of a Ghost Exorcism Agency, accept commissions and, together with friends, travel to various locations to investigate, find ghosts, and exorcise them.

name: Floor 9: Beginning
description: In Floor 9, you find yourself trapped in a mysterious hotel known as "Hotel Liminal." To escape, you must identify anomalies on each floor. These anomalies can be anywhere - on the ground, in paintings, or even right in front of your eyes.

name: Project Heck
description: This is a casual and entertaining typing game that lets you experience the thrill of hacking systems by rapidly typing on your keyboard. Whether stress-testing your keyboard or unwinding after a tough day, this game has got you covered!

name: Echo of Fear: Vol.1 Night Visit
description: ECHO OF FEAR is a psychological horror game where you play as a detective who receives a box containing 6 mysterious videotapes. Each tape represents a separate story connected by a common plot. The plot is based on the Cthulhu myths by H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Five Nights At Skibidi Toilets
description: FNAST offers a unique gameplay that combines elements of strategy, survival and horror. Will you be able to solve the mystery of this mysterious building and prove the truth of the information from the newspapers?

name: Call of The Deep
description: A short first-person retro sci-fi horror game where you traverse to the bottom of the ocean on foot, in 1985.

name: Moon Colony
description: Play as an astronaut on our moon in the future. Your task is to prepare the moon for future colonies by terraforming. Collect resources, explore procedurally generated caves, build buildings and create a second world for you and our earth.

name: Stars Commander
description: This is a game set in space and focused on trade of resources between spaceships and space stations.

name: Norowareta: The Three Treasures
description: Embark on a chilling journey as a young woman uncovers her past, answering the call of a tormented soul. Explore an isolated shrine in Japan and be transported back to the Edo period. Navigate through the mysteries and terrors of a fateful night in this spine-chilling horror survival game.

name: Made in Tower
description: Go up to the 100th floor！

name: Whispering Age
description: Whispering Age is a strategy where you command your army through written orders. Manage resources, build your empire, and defend your base against waves of enemies. Adapt to the unique dynamic of indirect control and lead your kingdom to glory!

name: Lumen Inferius
description: Explore a haunting and punishing world in this 2D action RPG. Lumen Inferius combines fast-paced combat with intricate RPG mechanics. Traverse ancient ruins, dark forests, and decaying castles, uncovering secrets of a cursed land. Your skill and strategy will determine its fate.

name: MultiMaze Party
description: Chaotic mazes, cute animals, ruthless races. Anything goes in this completely wacky local multiplayer game !

name: High Impact
description: First Person Shooter with very detailed worlds. It includes Platforming and rooms with Puzzles that you need to solve in order to advance.

name: Creeping Dusk
description: Creeping Dusk is a tower defense game. Build a town around an abandoned gold mine and defend against monsters that swarm the area. Fortify your defenses, and prepare for the increasingly challenging nights. Will you be able to protect your town from the encroaching darkness?

name: Supermarket Together
description: The multiplayer supermarket has arrived to your neighbourhood for free! Stock your shop space, unlock perks and franchises, hire employees or chase those pesky shoplifters. The more players, the more action!

name: Luminedge
description: Slash your way through intense laser sword combat with up to 4 players! Or lead your army into battle, solo or 2-player co-op, in a node-based conquest campaign.

name: California Escapades
description: In this simulation and adventure game, explore 19th-century Gold Rush California. Join Jim and Emma to build and manage your farm and city. Plant crops, raise animals, construct buildings, complete missions, uncover secrets, and collect treasures. Start your adventure now!

name: One More Game
description: A role-playing game that you will collaborate with your junior sisters and challenge them to compete in esports games, helping them win the final championship.

name: Business Odyssey
description: In this game, you start with a small capital and aim to build a business empire in the city by deciding which business to set up in which shop and deciding the prices. Business Odyssey is a business simulation that will test your business acumen and strategic planning skills.

name: Backseat
description: Backseat is a horror game where you play as a taxi driver forced to transport sinister passengers and survive the ride. An unknown man has kidnapped your wife and demands you gather information on each passenger. Can you survive the night and uncover the mystery behind your wife's kidnapping?

name: Cinema Simulator 2025
description: Cinema Simulator 2025 is a simulation game where you will manage your own movie theater and test your strategy and management skills. Starting from a small movie theater, try to become a giant in the movie industry.

name: Roadlike
description: Roadlike is a roguelike arcade racing game combining classic high-speed thrills with procedurally generated tracks. Customize your car with upgrades and enjoy endless replayability, racing solo or with friends in local multiplayer!

name: Keep This Land
description: Heavy metal, battle wizardry and blood of monsters from the deep. Will you keep this land from evil?

name: Azooma
description: "Azooma" is an action-adventure game where players control an introverted boy navigating the humorous challenges of avoiding family gatherings.

name: The First Settlement VR
description: Immerse yourself in "The First Settlement VR," a medieval city-building simulation. Construct unique buildings, manage production chains, and trade with neighboring towns. Experience the evolving economy and culture through your strategic decisions. Witness the impact of your actions in VR.

name: Whiskers
description: This game places you against a pristine white backdrop

name: DuaLight
description: In this challenging cyberpunk platformer switch between day and night environments, go through dangerous obstacles by manipulating gravity and time. Upgrade your abilities to conquer these levels with an intense soundtrack. Are you ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush?

name: Tiny-Fi
description: Your house is a vast and dangerous place, especially when you've been shrunk to the size of a bug! In Tiny-Fi, join Alain's struggle to survive in the attic. Can you make it out of the house in this atmospheric adventure? Your home has never felt so big!

name: Nordhold: Origins
description:
Immerse yourself in Nordhold: Origins, a tower defense game with high replayability. Build a medieval Nordic village, develop its economy, and defend it with unique towers and upgrades. Choose heroes and relics, compete on leaderboards, and aim for the Valhalla rank!

Nordhold: Origins is the Prologue Game for the full Game "Nordhold".

name: Himegashima Island
description: Kokomi is sent to the island of Himegashima, where his cousin demands that he spend his summer making happy memories. Having grown up sheltered, there's a whole new world of things for Kokomi to experience.

name: Nyaz
description: A dungeon crawler for cats that even beginners can play.

name: Kakuro++
description: Put your neurons into action 16 difficulty levels for beginners to experts. And lots of tools if you're stuck on a difficult puzzle

name: Multiversal Time Survivors
description: Classic Spin on Survivors Genre. Choose one among many characters and Travel though multimple dimensions battling foes.

name: Black Hole Survivor
description: A physics based twin-stick shooter about surviving as long as possible and getting a high score. Use your gravity beam or your gravity mine to destroy endless waves of enemies situated around a black hole.

name: Wizard's Legacy
description: Wizard’s Legacy blends VR immersion with roguelite replayability, offering action, adventure, and fantasy. Play as a powerful wizard, explore dynamic dungeons, face formidable foes, and uncover ancient secrets. Become the wizard you were meant to be.

name: Pretty Agent
description: Urgent mission! According to reliable intelligence, the female drug Lord Miss S is hiding in the city's X hotel. In order to avoid causing unnecessary panic, please play as female agent 33 to the destination to execute secret arrest!

name: Survivor Company
description: Survive waves of WWII enemies with your squad in this 2.5D roguelike. Use support & assault cards to amp firepower. Time's ticking, make your stand!

name: Undivine
description: A dark metroidvania with RPG elements, "Undivine" challenges you to explore, battle, and uncover secrets in a desolate, interconnected world. Customize your abilities, wield unique weapons, and delve into deep lore filled with mystery.

name: Penguin Panic!
description: A penguin's life is never easy. Even more so when you're a penguin mother, looking to protect her eggs. Penguin Panic is a cute platformer and features simple controls, secret challenges and cheerful graphics. A fast-paced action game that no one will want to put down.

name: Ice Cream Wars
description: A madcap arcade driving game in the unexpectedly cut-throat world of the frozen confectionary distribution industry. Race against the clock (and Gelatoni's henchmen) to provide the residents of Rippleton with the sweet frozen treats they're craving.

name: Globe Games
description: A suite of turn based games and puzzles on a spherical grid: Chess, Go, and Othello.

name: Hot Springs
description: Immerse yourself in the warm waters and relaxing atmosphere of Japanese's Onsen

name: Alon
description: Dive into non-stop battles against endless waves of enemies. Use a variety of weapons and powers, customize your character, and discover new strategies.

name: The Green Book
description: Welcome to The Green Book: Your Cozy Journey into Magical Plant Shopkeeping!

name: False Mall
description: You have wandered into an infinite looping shopping mall in Japan. If you notice changes within the mall, you might be able to escape.

name: Myst of Guatemala
description: Experience this first-person horror game in a tiny Guatemalan home. As a journalist, you investigate a mysterious villa after your long-lost friend Eddie calls. Grim halls, monsters, and rusty mailbox blood await. The four chapters include spooky stories, jump scares, and difficult riddles.

name: The Sunday
description: The Sunday is a short walkthrough horror game where the idea of being alone will hunt you, until the drakness settles in your brain. The line between reality and nightmare is razor thin.

name: Shareholders
description: Welcome to Shareholders an economy \ strategy \ simulator. Explore the depths of a simulated economy that is rich with mechanics and activities: from production and stock market manipulation to managing consumer demand and influencing global trade through exports and imports.

name: Ship on Wheels
description: Welcome to Ship on Wheels, an exciting arcade racing game! Easily join the official seasons or create your own custom tracks. Players can also design unique arenas with mini-games. Dive in and start racing!

name: Womb Defense Force
description: Run and gun your way deep into the neo-humanoid territory and save mankind from its own creation! Fight as special ops commander Layla in this mutant blasting weapon rich 2D action sci-fi shooter!

name: Sex Airlines
description: Welcome aboard SEX Airlines - an adult visual novel where you shape the story of professional pilot Arthur and people around him!

name: Swamp Hunter
description: Swamp Hunter, A Creature Slayer Extraction Looter game utilizing the latest features of Unreal Engine 5. Pushing the boundaries of of political satire and hilarious social commentary to deliver a game that is almost as crazy as our real life world.

name: Sex Massage 2
description: Enter the captivating world of the visual novel SEX Massage 2 , where you take on the role of Daniel, a talented masseur and owner of a small massage parlor. Daniel is determined to elevate his business to new heights, but the path to success is filled with challenges and temptations.

name: Merge Donut
description: Merge Donut is a delightful clicker game where you click on Donuts! Every 3 and 18 hours, receive a surprise Donut to grow your vibrant collection. Can you gather them all?

name: Forest Heroes
description: "Forest Heroes" combines tower defense with roguelike deck building. Enjoy intense battles and diverse strategies with simple controls!

name: Futanari Sex Adventures: Episode 2
description: This is an adult visual novel series featuring a stunning red-haired futanari as the protagonist. In this episode, the story unfolds at a luxurious spa center.

name: Island Escape 2
description: You are stranded on an island, and here you can do quests for the inhabitants, level up your character, build whatever you want, play with cool weapons and much more. Your goal is however to find a way off the island and find out how you got there. As mentioned, you can build, craft, and you can also manipulate the island's terrain.

name: Lizards Must Die 2
description: Lizards Must Die 2 is a cooperative slasher action game, a high–quality continuation of the SENSATIONAL first part. Insidious lizards attacked the lands of the Rus again. HYPERBOREA is on fire and only the GLORIOUS HEROES can lick the invaders from their homeland.

name: Magic the Wandering
description: The Lemmings roguelike. Magic the Wandering is a puzzle platformer where you learn spells, discover powerful wizards, and build your party to guide them through the world.

name: Escape Gaia
description: you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Zoned
description: A procedural VR-Action game. Humanity sent out probes to prepare solar systems for our descendants. A probe calls back requesting manual assistance. Use your headset to remotely plug into a Service Robot at location. Upgrade. Find the malfunction & Save humanity’s Solar Garden of a Civilization.

name: Esoterica Order
description: Drop in take on the challenge, in this third person shooter. The odds will be against you and continue to not be in your favor. Good luck Phantom.

name: Overnight Watch
description: As a new hired employee of Paranormal Security you need to monitor live surveilance cameras and report any anomaly you can find. Can you find them all and will you survive?

name: Queen Slayer
description: 'Queen Slayer' is a turn-based RPG set in a fascinating fantasy world. The player must lead heroes of various professions and skills to defeat the powerful queens who dominate the underground dungeons and save the kingdom from darkness.

name: CardScrawl
description: Enter the Chaotic Tower and take part in the Tower Lord's gambit in this Auto Battler, Roguelike Deckbuilder. Wielding the power of your Creature and Enchantment decks, the limits of your strategy will be tested. The Tower Lord awaits a worthy opponent. Are you ready?

name: Nezha Crossing the Sea
description: With more arms and weapons, you will be able to defeat many opponents at the same time - this game will bring you a unique multi-arm combat experience.

name: Stellar Checkpoint
description: Inspect alien documents as Earth's first interstellar border agent. Verify passports, detect forgeries, and make crucial decisions that impact human-alien relations. Can you keep Earth safe while navigating complex intergalactic regulations?

name: Spellarium 11
description: Play Match3 Puzzle and return the dying world back to life!

name: Ameizu
description: Sin descripción

name: Dark Era
description: A Game set in post-apocalyptic world where an alien virus has taken over, kill the infected ones ,Survive their attacks , clear the levels to complete the game. There are currently two game modes one is level based and another is Arcade mode.

name: Trapped: Wayne's Chamber
description: Sin descripción

name: Nerl's Crazy C"rough"t!
description: A falling block merge puzzle game starring the wizard Nail. Drop blocks from above and evolve them... but there are three evolution paths! Each block has a freshness level, and if left unattended, it will turn into trash!?

name: Peech World
description: An action - packed turn based bullet hell RPG. Explore and save a vibrant world!

name: Hero of the Hive
description: Take flight in this casual adventure game as a bee on a mission to save your crumbling hive. With the Queen mysteriously missing, it's up to you to gather resources to rebuild, explore the vast basin, and embark on quests to help the animals of nature as you become the hero your hive needs!

name: Magic vs. Mind
description: MvsM (Magic vs Technology) is a stylized cartoon-themed co-op PvE game where two different teams fight against enemy creatures on the same map. The game can be played with a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 8 players.

name: Super Dungeon Muncher
description: Avoid becoming Muncher's next meal in this fast-paced adventure! Control your anger, this game is hard!

name: Small Maze
description: Through maze after maze

name: Defender of Falyndor
description: Defender OF Falyndor is a First-Person Tower Defense game in Virtual Reality! Take control of your character, towers, and much more to protect Falyndor from waves of invasions to become the ultimate Defender of Falyndor!

name: Campgrounds Adventures
description: Campgrounds Adventures: The Big Oopsie is a captivating time management and strategy game where you build and manage thriving campsites. ️ Balance tasks, develop strategies, and progress through levels filled with lush landscapes and bustling campsites. Dive in and start your adventure today!

name: Archery Pro
description: Archery Pro brings life-like, competitive archery straight to your living room through VR! There’s no need for archery equipment to experience the fun of Olympics style Archery with Archery Pro. Simply pop on your headset and experience all the thrills of real-life archery.

name: A Pair of Feathers Squawk Together
description: "A Pair Of Feathers Squawk Together" is an easy-to-play, challenging-to-beat platformer inspired by the likes of Jump King and Bread & Fred. Flap the Parrot only has two controls: a right flap, to flap to the right, and a left flap, to flap to the left. As you get higher up the island, you'll encounter new regions with new gimmicks and traps to be wary of. Avoid getting sent back to the ocean down below, and find the treasure at the peak!

name: Cats-Shaped
description: Cats-Shape is a clicker game, in which you click on a cat shape!Earn random cat shapes to grow your collection!Come hang out with us and let's become the kings of cat shapes!

name: Night Shift
description: Night Shift is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel that focuses on Urban experiences. The game is packed with humor, sex, romance, crime, action, drama, and an intriguing story. Play as a young black male trying to figure out his path or a young white former star athlete trying to prove his worth.

name: Naals Tales
description: Hook into a physical platforming adventure with Scark'Tee, a fearless Naal who dwells on the inhospitable moon of Naltiune.With his long tail, Scark'Tee swings, fights, and slides through perilous environments, helping his friends and facing unique challenges.

name: Isle of Reveries
description: Make a pilgrimage skybound to the Isle of Reveries, where any wish can be granted. Conquer mysterious dungeons, solve head-scratching puzzles, and fight dangerous enemies in this retro-inspired action adventure.

name: End Gate: The Last Passenger
description: You wake up, alone, in a hypersleep box, with no memories left. You find yourself in an enormous space station, orbiting with a strange asteroid, around a gigantic black hole. And now, it's time to search, everywhere, to understand who you were. And most importantly, what's left to do here.

name: Surrounded by Death
description: Lead your people, fight for survival, become their ruler in this 2D strategy game. To accomplish this, you will have to create powerful walls, an efficient economy and a strong army

name: Fear Followers
description: A co-op horror about investigating and recording monsters to earn reputation for your Cult. You keep the recordings you make whether or not you die.

name: Nightmare Within
description: Nightmare Within - is an atmospheric horror game built on Unreal Engine 5 by a solo developer. Explore the dark corners of a house with a flashlight and solve puzzles while trying not to scream.

name: CatClick
description: CATCLICK is an exciting adventure game where you help a mother cat find her lost kittens. Play in Relax Mode, simply enjoying the search process with pleasant music, or choose the Bad Cats Mode where you save the world from mutant cats. Explore levels, enjoy beautiful effects, and intuitive controls

name: S.X.E. Slider: Dungeons
description: A dungeon inspired sliding tile puzzle game featuring 25 gorgeous images with a fantasy theme.

name: DreamWorld
description: The Infinite Sandbox MMO. For Builders, By Builders. Explore an infinite world with all your friends on one server. Build unbelievable structures using advanced building tools like volumetric selection and copy/paste. Battle bosses and mobs, farm, craft and more in DreamWorld.

name: Snowfall Symphony: A Tale of Crustallus
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating visual novel set in a dark vampire world where romance and cruel decisions shape your fate, leading to multiple unique endings.

name: RogueCards
description: This "RogueCards" is a deck-building and roguelike version of "Daifugo" a game that all Japanese have played before! You use 53 cards, including jokers. How they grow depends on luck and your judgment. Aim for a stronger deck! Try the even more strategic "Daifugo".

name: Make It Count
description: Make It Count is a post-apocalyptic, top-down shooter with roguelite elements. Venture into different missions with randomized routes and bring carnage to the filth that is infesting this world!

name: Night Keep
description: In Night Keep you build your own empire and defend it against waves of enemies.

name: Dropped into the Modern World: Surviving the Red-Light District
description: After an attack by a monster, the sorceress Daiya suddenly gets teleported to modern-world Kabukicho! Without a home and all alone, she gets offered shelter by a person named XiaoHong. With their help, Daiya is able to start a new life, but can she return to her home world…?

name: Pan Beats
description: Cute simple rhythm game! All you have to do is press the falling notes in time with the rhythm! The game can be enjoyed by both sound game beginners and those who are familiar with sound games, with familiar songs and three different difficulty levels. Please try to play this game!

name: Master of Shotgun Camper
description: Hey Corner Campers! "Master of Shotgun Camper" is designed for you to perfect the art of corner camping and pre-aiming.

name: Ravenwood Drive
description: Explore the eerie depths of Ravenwood Drive as Emma, drawn by a mysterious letter. Your journey quickly turns dark, where every shadow conceals a sinister truth. Dare to confront the darkness within.

name: Ninja: Shadow of the Dash
description: Ninja: Shadow of the Dash is a fast-paced 2D speedrun platformer where you race against the clock to finish challenging levels as quickly as possible. With precise controls and high difficulty, only the best gamers can master it. Test your skills and aim for the fastest times!

name: Gourds Up
description: Gourds up is a 2D shooter, with many roguelike-y elements. You will progress through runs by choosing the next rooms, through the form of cards, that you will fight in, allowing for more strategy during the run. Get random weapons and upgrades, and just don't die!

name: Find it! Festival in the Hotel
description: We are holding the Find it! festival in the hotel! Walk around the rooms and search for hidden items. In rooms filled with many things, can you find the items you're looking for? Enjoy 10 different themed rooms.

name: Tennistronic
description: Increase your reflexes by hitting the ball that reaches higher speed with each bounce, and at the same time give it spin to score a goal to your opponent.

name: Greengrocer's
description: Greengrocer's is a clicker game where you click vegetables! In Greengrocer's, you click vegetables to gain even more vegetables! For every 3 clicks, you get a new vegetable! You will also receive extra vegetables for the time you spend managing your Greengrocer's.

name: City Bus Driver Simulator 2
description: “Do we have to wait long for the bus?” it's a phrase that will never be heard on your route.

name: Cyber Hearts Club
description: Cyber Hearts Club is an immersive game where players enter the virtual world of the Social Media Club. In this game, you'll have the opportunity to study and navigate the fascinating intricacies of social media, encountering various challenges and characters that enrich the experience. Throughout your journey, you'll make important decisions and discover new ways to interact with the digital community. Cyber Hearts Club blends captivating storytelling with a deep exploration of social media phenomena, providing an UNFORGETTABLE gaming experience.

name: Circuit Runner
description: Circuit Runner is a fast-paced cyberpunk game where you collect resources to escape a dystopian tower. Use active and passive skills to outwit enemies and overcome obstacles. Compete on Leaderboards for ultimate bragging rights in this thrilling race for freedom.

name: Riftcast
description: A cyber companion for your desktop inspired by LCD virtual pets of old. Collect, train and fight all sorts of Reverians as you take on daring ventures, fun mini-games and fierce battles.

name: Untold Story
description: A classic 2D RPG in the style of Valiant and Aveyond, a tale about wealth, power and knowledge.

name: Fish Chips and Bombs
description: Dive into the fin-tastic world of PvP (Phish vs Phish) where you use your gravity defying fishing rod to move around bombs and blow your fish friends into chips! It’s a reel blast!

name: Raceborn
description: Raceborn is a racing game featuring miniature cars in diverse locations with extensive vehicle customization options. Win races, earn upgrades, and showcase your creativity to become a racing legend.

name: Lullaby Data
description: Follow the story of Lullaby and Echo in a futuristic world. Mixing action and adventure, meet many unusual characters, play numerous mini games, and explore space to discover the secrets of Lullaby and the mad gods.

name: Level Up 80
description: LEVEL UP 80 is an action game with magic and shooter mechanics, where a lone knight must level up from 1 to 80 to defeat a massive orc army. Utilize various spells and weapons to protect peaceful lands from invaders.

name: Skidaddle Skidoodle
description: Skidaddle Skidoodle is a single-player arcade game about a small forest gnome mage who protects the forest from evil creatures with magical spells, restoring harmony and balance to nature.

name: Hue Hop
description: Hue Hop is a visually captivating color-matching game in a minimalist isometric world. Navigate a luminous circle across a grid of colorful rings, aligning matching colors to score points. With intuitive controls and a competitive scoring system, it offers a relaxing yet challenging experience.

name: A Room You Can't Exit Unless You Find the Numbers
description: You have been trapped in a room you can't exit unless you find the numbers. Let's find the numbers inside the room and escape.

name: Depth Ascend
description: Embark on an epic race for your survival, feeding on fish before time runs out. Unlock new levels as you dodge dangers and uncover the mysteries of the depths in Depth Ascend.

name: Get Rich
description: "Get Rich" is a thrilling 2D roguelike shooter that plunges you into a corrupt metropolis teeming with danger and intrigue. Join the quest to get revenge and justice in a city riddled with corruption.

name: Iltami
description: 2D Fantasy game. Chill and easy to play or fast and difficult..? The GREEN circle is for play, the BLUE circle is for controls. Collect all the birds and reach all the levels as fast as possible. Have fun! It goes well with red wine or cold beer...

name: A Simple Door
description: Try to escape from “A Simple Door” by facing your past, your darkest secrets and your fears through the doors.

name: Trapped 2: Pirates
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Squad
description: Sin descripción

name: The Ninja Gaiden as Interpreted by MiniMacro Sound
description: This is a from-the-ground-up reimagining of the first Ninja Gaiden NES game. All of the levels are redesigned from scratch, the soundtrack is entirely remixed and there are new graphics.

name: High School Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Murder Mall Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Wuthering Waves: Thaw of Eons
description:
Version 1.1 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Jinhsi and Changli
• New location: Mt. Firmament
• New companion story for Changli (Immortal Blaze)
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire 2010
description: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire 2010 was a mobile game based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire by Capcom originally released in 2009.

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: 2nd Edition
description: A J2ME port of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: 2nd Edition.

name: A G-G-Ghost!
description: Sin descripción

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: Music Edition
description: A musical themed version of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire for mobile.

name: Mental Salvo
description: Mental Salvo is a top down art game with an infinite open world where you can explode your head and do so many other things, they're impossible to list. It will tickle your brain in various ways. You can spend hours walking and interacting and keep stumbling upon new things. Follow your curiosity.

name: A Gunshot in Room 37
description: Sin descripción

name: A Knight's Pursuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Drift 'N' Thrift
description: Drift 'N' Thrift is an arcade game where you drift away from police while collecting gold and coins.

name: Mega Blaster
description: Use the right force on the TNT plunger to aim for the blocks and demolish the tower.

name: Hop 'N' Stack
description: Hop and stack up on incoming blocks of varying speeds and sizes.

name: Aggretsuko Office Rush
description: Help Retsuko overcome her days at work. Balance between managing requests and completing your workload. Don’t forget to keep that rage under control!

name: Pac-Man Arcade Golf
description: Pac-Man Arcade Golf was a mobile golf game featuring Pac-Man and friends.

name: Transmute Syndrome
description:
You have been detained by the Stellar Coalition Police Department for carrying a dangerous disease known only as "transmute syndrome". This condition is said to give the infected an unnatural ability to morph themselves into identical copies of other living beings. However, what they don’t know is that it only applies to inanimate objects, and where you come from, the ability is just as natural as breathing to you. Do you think you can escape?

Transmute Syndrome is a stealth / puzzle game featuring a total of 9 levels across three different areas, numerous copyable objects, fully recorded voice lines as well as a unique soundtrack. The game was developed over a course of 2 weeks for the Pirate Software Game Jam 15.

name: Black Sea: Treasure Hunters
description: Sin descripción

name: Hakkenkast
description:
Hakkenkast is a top-down dungeon crawler for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum.

It’s designed as an arcade adventure and can be played with 4 directional keys and a single fire key - so it works great with Kempston & Sinclair joysticks.

name: The Swarm is Coming
description: Sin descripción

name: Tabou Stories: Love Episodes
description: Experience the ultimate fantasy with Tabou Stories! Immerse yourself in a world where your choices shape your destiny. From everyday dilemmas to heart-pounding drama and, of course, falling head over heels in love, Tabou puts you in control of your own story.

name: Reimu Needs Help!? Aunn-chan to the Rescue!
description: Speedily solve Reimu's problems by skillfully stopping slot reels to pick two words to create items to give her!

name: A Bug's Life: Active Play
description: Sin descripción

name: Nev's Socks
description: Help Nev catch all the socks that are falling from the washing line into his basket.

name: 2 Minutes in Space
description:
2 Minutes in Space is a simple minimalistic game that turns you to an astronaut exploring the universe in your new spaceship. Fly to the Moon, Asteroid Belt, Nebulas and Gravity Fields. Navigate your spacecraft along or with a personal fleet. Your main goal is to maneuver your spaceship through challenging obstacles and stay alive!

The game has 3 kinds of controls, 15 spaceships to navigate, 5 maps/locations and diverse superpowers such as energy boost, deflector shield, ammunition and EMP.
Dodge all deadly missiles coming your way, collect gold pieces and update your spaceship! Try to survive as long as you can!

name: Keep it alive!
description: Defend the baby monster with the Force against falling obstacles! A fun physic game to play fast.

name: Beer Drinkin' Terrorist Hunter
description: Beer Drinkin' Terrorist Hunter is challenging, fast-paced, 2d shooter. Inspired by games like Wolfenstein 3d, Doom, and Duke Nukem. Fight your way to downtown by collecting and unleashing a full arsenal of 2d weapons. Visit places like the mall, downtown, and a factory. Fight on highways, in warehouses, and on rooftops. Shoot a variety of enemies including bosses.

name: Centipede Channel F
description: Sin descripción

name: Hong Kong 2099
description: Sin descripción

name: Casketball Queen
description: Cleo plays Casketball

name: Dark Stories
description:
Dark Stories is an easy to play and fun game in which you will need to prove your skills as a detective.

Read a story to the rest of the players and just answer yes/no to their questions until they find out what happened. All the stories are fictional.

It is perfect for birthday parties, camps... and every situation in which you join several friends.

name: Froggie Dash
description: Lagoona's frogs have to escape Monster High!

name: Destiny Encore
description: A frenetic third-person shooter with roguelite elements and a large skill tree.

name: Driver's Dread!
description: Help Draculaura get her driver's license.

name: Scary Sun
description: Draculaura has gone underground to hide from the sun. Help protect her from crabs and creatures.

name: Match the Monsters!
description: Find and match three in a row of Monster High items and characters.

name: Galaxy Idle Clicker
description: Embark on an interstellar journey with Galaxy Idle Clicker! Conquer galaxies, upgrade your spaceship, and face off against a myriad of enemy ships. With engaging minigames, powerful upgrades, GIC delivers an unparalleled idle space adventure. Join the cosmic conquest today and dominate the universe!

name: Picross
description: Sin descripción

name: Piecrust
description: Sin descripción

name: Porklike: Wurst Comes to Worst Gameboy
description: Sin descripción

name: Riley's Letter Recycle
description: Sin descripción

name: Superpix
description: Sin descripción

name: Tag-Along Todd
description: Sin descripción

name: Tongueman's Logic
description: Sin descripción

name: Hell's House
description: Sin descripción

name: Sword and Hammer: Hand of the King
description: The reign is in chaos, choose between Sigfried the Sword of the king and Gregor the hammer of the king, live an epic adventure fighting against thieves, rebel knights and a dark cult leaded by a lich. Real actors lend their faces and skills to this fantasy adventure you will not easy forget, can you survive or will you die fighting for the king?

name: Colonies: Neociv
description: Official description: Neociv is a perfect world were people only work on their passions. But something is not right and you are scrambling for your life and the future of Neociv in this story-driven adventure game.

name: Dragon Forge
description: Unleash the deadly force of the dragon! Fight archers with bow and arrow, and mages with powerful magic! Earn upgrades and bring entire castles crashing to the ground! With awesome 3D, Hi-Def graphics, and killer goth-rock soundtrack. Dare you unleash the dragon!

name: Covert Operations
description: Covert Operations (sometimes shortened to Covert Ops) is a tactical military Doom II total conversion created by Black Shadow Software that requires the source port EDGE and reuses many resources in 1998's Twilight Warrior made by the same team. Covert Ops abandons DeHackEd patches and instead uses DDF to create custom enemies and re-loadable weapons. The WAD was an early showcase of EDGE features including 3D floors, colored lighting, translucent deep water, falling snow, and RTS action triggers.

name: The Adventures of Captain Becky
description: The adventures of pirate captain Becky! Clear all stages and defeat the enemies! Play a total of 24 stages in EASY, NORMAL and HARD mode! Unlock the Extra stage! Collect 5 different costumes!

name: Baby Mammoth's Journey to Mars
description: Help the baby mammoth escape the end of the world! Outrun the avalanche, duck under hungry vultures, and bash through trees in this epic fight against extinction!

name: Three Kingdoms: Zhuge Liang
description: Employ tactics and formations to conquer cities and dominate the land, ultimately unifying the realm. The game features HD-2D graphics, offering a refreshing and stunning visual experience. Combining 2D pixel art style with 3D scenes, it delivers a visual feast for players.

name: Sclash: Joystick
description: Let's celebrate French video games together! Unlock a Games Made In France mask and weapon for use in the game.

name: Me & My Friend Pippa!
description: Make your mark as an aspiring adventurer by embarking on a journey to save King Elesio's missing Pippa in this charming bite-sized RPG!

name: Morriton Manor Stories: Nordic Whispers
description: A mystery detective game with RPG elements. Cursed by demonic forces, a mysterious island is trapped in a time loop. Leah Glessner, Private Investigator of the Supernatural, uses her unique gift of photographic memory to confront evil. Skill your character. Investigate. Solve the case.

name: Taboo Trial: 5.0 Weapon And Dark Gold
description: The DLC5.0 for Taboo Trail.After enabling this DLC, you can open 5.0 game content, which is independent of 4.0 saves and allows you to freely choose different modes for a gaming experience

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend GP-02
description: "Long-lost Friend" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP02." 1. Marriage system 2. Private maid mode 3. Empire life mode

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend GP-01fb
description: "Long-lost Friend" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01fb." ・Sexy love date play ・Happy happy morning!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Sweet, Affectionate, and Devoted Long-lost Friend GP-01
description: "Long-lost Friend" is now compatible with the following content added in "CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic + GP01." 1. Empire Life Mode

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Step in Summer All in One Pack
description: With the summer approaching, CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic Step in Summer ALL in ONE Pack offers content that expresses Japan's fickle weather and one's feelings this time of year. 6 Events 3 Costume Sets 3 Hairstyles 3 Karaoke Dances

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: Character EX Pack Gyaru
description: ・1 new Normal & High-poly body maid outfit ・1 new Normal & High-poly body lingerie set ・1 new Normal & High-poly body hairstyle ・70+ yotogi skills ・2 types of New yotogi events! ・Hiring interview, affection increase, stat increase, and plenty more events for the Master to talk to Gyaru!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic Just Around the Summer All in One Pack
description: Summer is just around the corner, which means it's the perfect time to get ready with the CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic Just Around the Summer ALL in ONE Pack! This pack features some short, breezy summer hairstyles and outfits to match, plus some summery dances!

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2&2.5+: X1+Vol.01
description: This DLC adds X1 compatibility for 5 personalities. You'll get to play special honeymoon events and yotogi as well as a Fishing minigame. Maids will now be compatible with the following events: 1. New Mode “Honeymoon Mode” 2. ”Honeymoon Yotogi” 3. ”NTR Honeymoon”

name: DayZ: Frostline
description: Embark on an unforgiving journey in DayZ's Frostline Expansion, set within the icy Sakhal archipelago, covering 83km² of winter wilderness. Face new challenges, manage the cold, and discover the beauty and peril of Sakhal. Coming Fall 2024. Prepare to survive.

name: Deck Dash
description: Create your deck, improve your cards by merging them, and defeat all your opponents. To be a survivor, don’t forget this; collect the best items you can find and upgrade them. Exciting duels await you on this island.

name: Watch Your Eggs!
description: Experience the thrilling world of Watch Your Eggs!, an action-packed third-person shooter game. As Agent Pops, your mission is to protect unhatched Frostwing Penguin eggs from wild Icy Land creatures. Plan your strategy, equip yourself with powerful weapons, and face the wave of furious enemies!

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Ford GT 2006
description: Inspired by the famous 1960s Ford GT40, the 2006 Ford GT pays tribute to the four-time winner of the 24 Hours of Le Mans. The design of this prestigious and high-performance car is reminiscent of its predecessor.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Street Pack
description: The Streets Silver pack includes: - Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR - Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG - Lord of the Streets outfit for your avatar - Streets sticker pack for customizing your cars

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: DLC Solar Content
description:
The Solar Content pack includes:
- Maserati MC20
- Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 1LE
- Board Committee Member outfit for your avatar
- Solar Crown sticker pack for customizing your cars

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Sharp Pack
description: The Sharps Silver pack includes: - Jaguar F-Type SVR Coupe - Audi R8 Spyder V10 RWS - Baron of the Sharps outfit for your avatar - Sharps sticker pack for customizing your cars

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Tiny Home
description: Tiny and cozy Houses, Fantastic and beautiful now here, try to relax with calming Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore - Household
description: A sweet home requires care. You will find the coziest embroidery patterns here with relaxing Embroidery process DLC includes 20 artworks from Small to Large

name: Paper Nomad: Master Edition
description: All Paper Nomad Base features + Online game Hosting + Import\Export + XXL Maps

name: Sand Land: Custom Vehicle Colors - 3 Types
description: Customize vehicles with 3 special colors. Colors can be applied to all customizable vehicles.

name: Raven's Daring Adventure
description: Raven has challenged you to various games to decide which of you will have to complete humiliating dares. A Choose-Your-Own-Adventure ENF-Themed game with over 1,700 3D Images and voice acting. Also includes 'Raven's Daring Trivia Night' and 'Alice'

name: Unicopia
description: Unicopia is a retro 2D platformer featuring a Unicorn racing to rescue her girlfriend from the clutches of an Evil Poodle. Jump up and down towers, collect gems, and reveal the key before the clock strikes and you're haunted by the ghost of time!

name: Sugar Rush
description: Enter the sweet world of Sugar Rush, an action packed top-down roguelike filled with sweets and treats to empower your journey. Test your skills by facing various fruit snacks, defeating them with color instead of damage. Find the best set of treats to survive as long as possible!

name: Zoe The Exhibitionist
description: Zoe has locked herself out of her house...naked. Your job is to help her make the right choices that'll lead her to clothes without being seen by too many people in a Choose-Your-Own-Adventure ENF-Themed game with over 1,700 3D Images and voice acting. Includes 'A Night With Itsuki'

name: Minecraft: Tetris
description: Dig into the strategic world of the Tetris DLC for Minecraft, where classic 2D Tetris meets the blocky adventures of dungeon crawling! Make your way through the matrix dungeons, battling colorful Tetrimonsters and unearthing pixelated secrets. With two different gameplay modes, iconic character customizations, this is Tetris like you’ve never known it before!

name: A Day in the Life of Death
description: A Day in the Life of Death is a whimsical narrative adventure about the one and only harvester of souls.

name: E-FCC
description: Immerse yourself in the action with E-FCC, the official Fast Close Combat video game, now available on Steam! E-FCC brings you a realistic airsoft simulation experience, based on the innovative sport of Fast Close Combat (FCC). Take on your friends or other online players in intense 1-on-1 duels where every hit counts.

name: Over Tooned
description: A game done in a GenX arcade style with an anime-ish feel

name: The Verbose Vault Venture
description:
The Verbose Sky Vault has opened for business recently, specialising in securing various high-value objects. A multi-layered security system operates at all times with an additional five-factor authentication containment unit protecting the main vault. Your client has become particularly interested in a small safe that was deposited here not long ago.

Your mission is to infiltrate the Verbose Vault, traverse the many layers of security, retrieve the safe and finally escape. Due to the highly secure nature of the vault, no alarm defuse boxes were located on site. Extreme caution is advised.

A TV studio themed level with multiple studios and hub-ish elements

name: Atlas Fallen: Reign of Sand

name: Phoenix

name: Tobichiyon X
description: Tobichiyon X is an Azumanga Daioh fan-game featuring Chiyo as the protagonist and Chiyo-Father as every enemy encountered in the game. It is a shoot-em-up primarily drawing inspiration from Ikaruga. The scoring system follows the player collecting star drops from enemies killed, these stars double as points and also bomb usage. Players must collect stars one after another without allowing them to fall off-screen to chain points together, doubling until the player reaches the star cap before resetting. It is vital that the player carefully chooses which enemies to kill as killing the wrong enemy will lead to stars falling out of reach, thus resetting the counter. Certain mini-boss like enemies will drop 3 stars upon death, with each star retaining the current score multiplier.

name: Intrigue Inc.: Raven's Flight
description: A legendary secret agent has gone rogue and Intrigue, Inc. needs you to track him down. Uncover Raven's diabolical plan and foil his grasp for power and glory in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle adventure game. Take on Raven's incredible intellect and think two steps ahead to capture him before he takes over the entire planet in Intrigue Inc.: Raven's Flight

description: The Twelve Slot Saloon is a Turn-Based RPG with Bullet Hell elements, where your choices matter as you travel across "The Land Without Happy Endings"! Play as a Cat, and explore this Wonderland by yourself, or with Friends! (Single-Screen Co-op.)

description: Grab some friends and explore randomly-generated maps as you use weapons & power-ups to beat off massive zombie hordes. Cooperation is encouraged, but be careful of stray bullets and bouncing grenades!

name: Dark Hunter
description: 《Dark Hunter》 is an easy-to-play Roguelike dungeon exploration game. You will lead a team to defeat enemies in the dungeon. You can switch characters at any time during combat, and with random buffs, each exploration promises a unique gaming experience.

name: Mobula

name: Home Snatch
description: As night falls, you are alone at home and experience strange events that reveal an evil entity. Survive the night in a desperate struggle with your worst nightmares. In this four-chapter journey, every shadow hides peril, and every noise could spell your demise.

name: Eastwind Adventures: Chapter 1
description: Eastwind Adventures Chapter 1 is a game of storytelling and adventure for all ages. Go on a great quest with three different heroes, some good, some not so good, and uncover the mysteries and magic of the lands of Eastwind!

name: Memoria VR
description: Memoria utilizes virtual reality to immerse healthy individuals in the experience of dementia symptoms, aiming to foster empathy and awareness regarding the challenges faced by people living with dementia.

name: Escape Gaia: Departure
description: you will play as Gaia, the shattered will of a planet, and command your spaceship to explore new worlds, collect and refine various resources, build a home on the damaged spacecraft, summon a wide range of monsters, and ultimately, devour other shattered wills to repair yourself.

name: Elemental World
description: Each adventure is unique thanks to randomized worlds. A challenging game play with roguelike elements will put your skills to the test. Play as Mage, Hunter, or Ronin!

name: Chroma

name: Medieval Nightt: Part 1
description: Medieval Nightt is a first-person horror game where, as a young adventurer, you explore an ancient medieval empire in ruins, facing restless spirits and paranormal creatures while unraveling the dark secrets of a lost civilization.

name: TacticsLand

The game features both a single-player mode and an online multiplayer mode. Enjoy your favorite mode and have a blast!

name: Magic Wand

name: Z Juice

Go undercover to race, shoot and smash a criminal group organizing an illegal "Lethal Tournament". Will you be able to survive?

description: Type: Science fiction and theology style FPS multiplayer shooting game; Topic: Discovering the Truth of the Universe in the Future of Humanity and Its Impact on the Evolution of Human Bones; Modes: PVE (Gun Shooting Battle and Summoning Flying Shuttle Battle), PVP (Gun Shooting Battle).

description: Blast your way through a low poly Western world in this thrilling Tetris style adventure. Use your six-shooter to clear lines and outlaws. Enjoy fast-paced action, stunning visuals, and unique gameplay. Saddle up, download Guntris today, and become the ultimate sharpshooting legend!

name: Strandzha Adventures 3D

name: Terrestrial

name: Cardinal Descent

Unleash devastating combos and discover game-breaking synergies as you delve deeper into the void, facing fierce enemies and escalating challenges. Carefully choose your card order to maximise impact and overcome your foes.

Accept contracts from intergalactic factions to earn reputation and favours, design your own rockets, set up your production lines to automate your rocket construction, manage your resources and become the most reliable colony !

description: Vortica is a 2D action roguelite set in a solar system overrun by hostile aliens. Suit up, loot up, and shoot up as you battle against enemy hordes, explore derelict outposts, and hunt giant bosses. Each mission gets you one step closer to reaching Earth and saving the human race.

name: NightClub Simulator

From hiring staff and organizing events to setting the perfect atmosphere with music and lighting, every choice you make will shape your club. Are you ready to become the ultimate nightclub tycoon?

name: LocoPets
description: The ultimate team-builder roguelike. Assemble a team of powerful LocoPets, collect game-breaking Charms, and unleash outrageous synergies to defend Tonto Kingdom.

name: The Upper Hand

description: In this first-person survival horror game, run and hide from Waffle Cone Willie, a haunted ice cream truck that roams through the town of Sweetwater seeking his next victim. Find clues, survive, and uncover the mystery and nightmare of Sweetwater.

name: Intergalactic Storage Clearance
