name: Jurassic Knights: Tactics
description: Jurassic Knights: Tactics is a turn-based tactical RPG. Navigate a sprawling campaign map, choosing your battles, accepting contracts, liberating settlements, and confronting foes. Optimize your soldiers to their maximum potential based on their backgrounds, traits and equipment.

name: Despondent
description: Despondent is a first-person survival horror title. Play as Sedgewick, a young man tossed into a hellish fight for his life while trying to pick up the pieces of his past. Manage a debilitating sickness, hold on to what little hope is left, uncover a rancid plot and just maybe... make it out alive.

name: Sonsgorod: The Archipelago
description: Attack, outmaneuver, misdirect. Sonsgorod is a roguelike card battler where positioning is key, enemies can be turned against one another, and one bad play can cost you everything. You'll need all your skill and creativity to prevail as you journey into the past and face down a mighty empire.

name: Terra Revive
description: A simulation of rebuilding a planet after it has been almost completely destroyed. Your task is to make the earth fit for human life again. Survive, build and explore!

name: SickWay VR
description: Sickway is a realistic VR game where you drive a two wheeled electric vehicle in the heights of the city with the goal of getting down. Good advice: Avoid falling down! You can use your creative abilities in track editor, or you can become the fastest among your friends in multiplayer maps.

name: Broken Tape
description: Broken Tape is a narrative-driven first person walking simulator with the elements of psychological horror. You take the role of a test subject in a secret organization. You were tasked with a job to eliminate anomalies in a series of old tapes, containing more than you might expect.

name: Revenge of Black Bone
description: Welcome to the seductive and perilous world of "Revenge of Black Bone," the eagerly awaited sequel to the smash hit game "Curse of Black Bone." Set sail once more for the sun-kissed shores of Port Royal, where treasures gleam, mysteries whisper, and beautiful women captivate.

name: Codename: Zalidium
description: Grab your standard issue pistol and join the agents in Codename: Zalidium. Explore the mysteriously deserted town of Turpentine Ridge. Run and gun down vicious goblins as you try and survive. Search for clues to uncover the strange events that led to their existence. Can you uncover the truth?

name: Hidden Kittens: Kingdom of Cats
description: Discover hidden kittens in the Kingdom of Cats! Explore cute and minimalist scenes, solve puzzles, and find adorable feline companions!

name: TimeFixers
description: TimeFixers is a fast-paced roguelike action game where you battle through diverse historical eras to save the timeline from rogue robots. Harness unique abilities, collect time keys, and face intense battles across stylized worlds from Ancient Egypt to Futuristic Space.

name: One Dash Star
description: In One Dash Star, you guide the Playing marbles towards the star by swiping and releasing it. On this exciting journey, you'll navigate through fixed and moving obstacles and save the star. Each level presents new challenges, and the diverse obstacles will test your focus and reflexes.

name: Labyrinth of Lust
description: Part man, part bull, and horny for raw, uninhibited sex. Rumors about sexual insanity in Minotaur's labyrinth were traveling all across the kingdom... Chained, whipped, and fucked, the blonde from the North and the dark girl of far South pleasure their new master in ways no mortal man could imagine.

name: FootCareer Ult
description: FootCareer ULT, the new way of Football SimulationFootCareer ULT is the latest and most simplistic Football Career simulation game there is. Want to becomethe greatest (or the worst)? Then try FootCareer ULT today!

name: Roll of Fate
description: Participate in a mysterious show, taking place far from civilization. The visual novel Roll of Fate gives you the opportunity to make decisions that affect the lives of the other show participants. Don’t try to save everyone – there’s no guarantee you can even save yourself.

name: Crypto Skoof Tycoon
description: Click on the sloppy guy, earn money and spend it on increasing your media influence and reputation to become a real crypto scammer. Decorate your table with the most valuable artifacts. Get rich from promises and become the blogger you hate so much!

name: Tribal Ritual
description: Every unwed girl of the tribe had to undergo the initiation. The tribesmen would take her deep into the jungle and leave her tied up. Around noon, the creature would come. Reptile & human, male & female, tits & cock, all at the same time. It would do things to the girl that she would never forget...

name: Intergalacticorp.
description: Intergalacticorp. is a sci-fi rogue-lite tower defense game where you take on the role of an operator-bot, charged with conducting an intergalactic mining operation. Will you thrive as an efficient miner in this alien environment, or succumb to the dangers that lurk in the depths of space?

name: Golfr
description: Golfr is a sci-fi golf action game. Set in the near future, a robot scout sent from Earth crash-lands on an alien planet that harbors ancient relics locked beneath abandoned golf courses. Golf your way through multiple biomes while engaging hostiles with only a club.

name: Aquest
description: Step into the shoes of the last standing drop of water, tasked with defending against the relentless assault of evil sponges determined to absorb every remaining drop. Although you stand alone, you possess all the water knowledge needed to create impressive structures and fend off your enemies.

name: Confinement 256
description:
Confinement 256 is a 60-level (plus 3 hub and secret maps) megawad for GZDoom released in June 2017 after a year of development. The project originally started as a solo megawad designed by Devon Barnett (Xyzzy01), with the first 20 maps made by him, but later evolved into a complete community project with 39 map contributions from various authors.

The megawad took inspiration from other projects such as Congestion 1024 and Claustrophobia 1024. All maps submitted were designed under the limit of a 256 by 256 square space in the level editor.

name: Puzzle Brawl
description:
Summon epic heroes to battle player defenses in turn based match-3 games.

Challenge players worldwide to match-3 battles. In this epic puzzle RPG, lead your squad of heroes in your quest to be the Brawl Master. Join the fight now!

MATCH 3 PUZZLE BATTLES
You and the enemy take turns solving match 3 puzzles on the same board. Form powerful match 3 combos to smite the enemy heroes or play defensively to deny their most powerful attacks. Make fun tactical tile matches to defeat the enemy in PvP combat.

PvP FIGHTS
Set up the ultimate defense team. Raid other players in versus battles around the world. Steal their trophies by defeating their defending heroes in turn based puzzle battles! Climb to the top of the arena and collect legendary heroes.

EPIC HEROES & SPELLS
Summon over 30+ heroes each with game changing ultimate skills. Disrupt the enemy formation by knocking back enemy tanks. Backstab an enemy hero! Control the tide of battle with fun hero skills! This is a game of strategy and tactics, the best team will emerge victorious!

MODERN PvP REWARD SYSTEM
Collect chests as you win battles, open them while you are idle. Puzzle Brawl is a mashup of traditional match 3 RPG with generous modern PvP games’ reward systems.

TACTICAL FORMATION
Discover unique team ups by placing your heroes in different positions. Form the best attack and defense squads to earn the most trophies! It is an easy to play fun to master game!

DAILY QUESTS
Earn generous rewards through daily quests by playing match-3 battles. Earn a range of loot from Magic to Legendary chests by completing daily puzzle quests.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Form a guild with friends for even more Puzzle Brawling fun! Share strategies, donate cards to help your guildmates, build your own community! Compete with each other to see who is the best Brawl Master!

name: The Island of Earthly Delights
description: Sin descripción

name: Demolish
description: This game is a road racer where players drive a sports car down a challenging highway.

name: Seekers: Enlightenment
description: In this 2D Action Platformer, embark on this journey with Ivy and Lara to seek out the real truth behind this world and perhaps the world beyond filled with gods, strange creatures, different enemies as you discover new environments.

name: Aero Battle Royale
description: Dominate the skies in breathtaking environments, battling opponents and mastering high-speed flight. Utilize your weapons and piloting skills to be the last pilot soaring!

name: Stop Them All
description: Control robot soldiers from an interplanetary mining company to defeat the defense system of a ruined colony. Buy soldiers, upgrade them, defeat waves of enemies.

name: Line Change
description: Line Change - A 2D pixel side-view game where you draw lines that become bridges from one point to another, allowing three creations to make their way to the finish.

name: Black Site
description: BLACK SITE is a 1-4 player co-op horror game. Explore the levels with your partner to gather info about some government experiments, while trying to communicate with your partner without being too loud. Free monthly content updates with new levels.

name: Ant Art Tycoon
description:
You are an out of luck art dealer with nothing to your name but 5 highly trained ants. Now it's time to put them to work, together they will create beautiful paintings that you can sell for big $$$.

Are you ready to make money and get rich in this idle clicker tycoon game? Become the next Anty Warhol now!

ANT FARMER
Tap to grow your ant colony by buying bigger and faster ants, and watch proudly as they create better and better artwork before your very eyes. Click and tap to build an army of ants making beautiful art work. Before you know it you'll have hundreds of ants creating new art in seconds.

ART DEALER
Watch the public's reaction to your paintings and click to adjust the sale prices to make the biggest profit possible! People don't like the painting? Tap to reduce the price and get rid of it. People love the painting? Let's see how high we can raise the price! Get rich and earn money to become an art tycoon by playing this idle clicker simulator game.

Tap to make money and get more ants to level up! Upgrade your ants' art skills and get your name out into the art world to become a tycoon in your new favorite idle clicker tycoon game. Play one of the most unique idle clicker games in the Google Play Store!

How many paintings can you sell in this casual idle game? Click and level up to get as many as idle benefits as you can to paint your next masterpiece! Become an Ant Art Tycoon in this free to play idle simulator game. You will love this game if you like idle clicker tycoon games and making money!

Enjoy this one of a kind idle tycoon game. It will quickly become one of your favorite free to play games. Let's have some fun! Put your ants to work and get rich now!

name: Xenowars: Set Sail
description: This is a turn-based strategy/RPG game set in the stars. In the early stages, you will recruit a team of experts on Earth for exploring a distant alien homeworld, choosing between scientists, mutants, and soldiers. Scour the planet for lost alien technology and uncover the secrets to Earth’s doom.

name: Bargan's Treasure
description: In "Bargan's Treasure," the player embarks on an adventure to restore a once-thriving village. After a disaster cut off power and water, the villagers fled, leaving puzzles in their wake. Your mission is to solve these puzzles, bring the villagers home, and revive the village.

name: Cyber Mokugyo
description: Mokugyo is a simple wooden fish simulator game, where by clicking on the wooden fish, you can earn merit points to achieve the effect of refining your character and purifying your body and mind.

name: EmyLiveShow: How to Write a Bestseller
description: Become the co-author of an amazing book! All you have to do is choose which of the four lovely heroines will inspire you!

name: Tower Lab
description: Tower Lab is a physics-based roguelike tower defense game where strategy meets chaos. Absorb energy from fallen foes, unlock new towers, and synergize your defenses to protect your lab!

name: Solateria
description: You are a small fire spirit born in a world of perishing spirits. Driven by someone's desperate voice, you embark on an adventure to find the 'First Flame'. Explore the peculiar, hand-drawn world of Solateria, defeat powerful enemies, and uncover the secrets of the world.

name: TimeKeeper
description: This is an idle casual game where you can shake the tree pole again when the number on the time board turns green and shows "0" to drop fruits from the tree. When you can shake the pole again, you'll find that several days have passed.

name: 3D Puzzle: Pizza Shop 1
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Witch Way
description: A dark witch imprisoned by the Church is forced to turn against her own kind, seeking the most chaotic power within the constraints of trust. This is not just a battle against enemies in action, but also requires a strategic and panoramic vision.

name: Echoes of Exile
description: Echoes of Exile is a short horror game where you must carefully navigate through space debris to escape the creature who lurks in the void.

name: Strange World
description:
Explore of what remains in this strange post-apocalyptic world.

Waking up from cryosleep in a world unfamiliar to them, a rag-tag group of survivors ban together to escape this dangerous land in hopes of discovering the cause of a strange apocalyptic event .

Strange World is a hybrid genre game combining RTS (Real-time strategy) with survival game elements. You can control up to 4 characters simultaneously to explore, manage and scavenge while crafting various tools and weapons to survive and thrive in this dangerous world.

name: Elder Legacy
description: Elder Legacy - This is a role-playing game. Embark on a soulful journey inspired by Boreyian myths and legends, filled with vibrant and unforgettable experiences. uncover the mystery behind the attempt to conquer the noble Boreyian people.

name: Playing the Favorite
description: Sin descripción

name: Baseball Navigator
description: Baseball Navigator is a simulation game in which the player takes the role of the new manager of a japanese baseball team, he can talk to the team members, decide the tactics and other things about the team.

name: Bring Your Own Class
description:
BYOC (Bring Your Own Class) is a modification for Doom 2 that aims to collaborate creators from a private community to have them Bring Yheir Own Classes in ZDoom derivative sourceports like: Zandronum. While it's made for online, Co-op play, this can be played offline as well.

In the mod there will be both well known characters that you know and love (e.g. Doomguy from Doom, Dr. Doomguy from Dr. Doom, Peppino from Pizza Tower, Heavy from TF2, Serious Sam from Serious Sam, Sir Dan from Medievil, Quote from Cave Story and PTG from PTG) and some original author created characters!

name: House of Fun
description:
Welcome to the House of Fun – The house of infinite casino slots games. Enjoy casino slots spins just for downloading!
From the creator of the most Popular Social slots games: Slotomania, Caesars Slots & Vegas Downtown Slots.
